content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the case involved the division of matrimonial property between the claimant and the defendant who are not named in the text the court awarded the claimant ownership of a passenger car and the defendant ownership of a plot of land the case was filed by the applicant seeking a divorce and the division of assets the applicants representative supported the application the defendant had the opportunity to file a defense but did not appear at the hearing the court considered the interests of any minor children and the financial situation of both parties when dividing the assets the court deviated from equal shares to protect certain interests awarding the car to the applicant and the plot of land to the defendant the applicants claims were granted in full the applicant paid the necessary fees and requested the defendant to pay the costs of the proceedings the court will determine the allocation of costs based on the success of each partys claims the court also considered the costs related to serving procedural documents and ordered the defendant to pay a fee of 1520 euros for this purpose the court supported the request to dissolve the marriage between the applicant and the defendant which was officially registered

metadata.cost: 1'520 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant
